First-time Setup
================

This tutorial gets you from zero to a working PackaStack environment with minimal manual steps. You will install dependencies, configure your workspace, and verify that PackaStack can create schroots and a local repository.

Steps
-----
1. Install required system packages (schroot, sbuild, git). If unsure, see the project README for the current list.
2. Create or select a workspace directory where PackaStack will manage schroots and the local repo.
3. Initialize the workspace (creates config, caches, and clones openstack/releases). Run once while online:

   .. code-block:: bash

      packastack init --prime

4. Verify PackaStack CLI is available:

   .. code-block:: bash

      packastack --help

Next, proceed to :doc:`schroot-creation` to build and validate your first schroot.
